body_html:
@yuefengz Let me open another issue for the out-of-range error. I usually get the warnings but sometimes get the assertion failure at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/collective_rma_local.cc#L49
CHECK_EQ(recv_bytes, hook->prod_value->TotalBytes());

body:
@yuefengz Let me open another issue for the out-of-range error. I usually get the warnings but sometimes get the assertion failure at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/collective_rma_local.cc#L49
`CHECK_EQ(recv_bytes, hook->prod_value->TotalBytes());`
